name.popover: The address name is a unique string to which messages can be sent and received.

queue.popover:
A queue is a store-and-forward mechanism. Use when:
  • messages are produced faster than they can be consumed
  • when messages are produced and will be consumed at a later time

topic.popover: A hierarchical address like country/state/city. Use when consumers want to control the level of detail messages they receive.

anycast.popover: Use when there are many message producers and only a few consumers.

multicast.popover: Use when there are one or more message producers and many message consumers.
